definition: to open out, to expand/bright, glorious
heart/intention/one's inclination/state of mind/to have the heart for sth/mood

sentences.english: Distribution and ratio of enterococcus species among different animals were different.
sentences.chinese: 不同動物消化道腸球菌種的分佈不同，比例各異。

sentences.english: Glutamine combined with rush had some synergetic effect on supporting bowel barrier function.
sentences.chinese: 聯合應用谷氨醯胺和生長激素可改善腸粘膜功能。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the diagnosis and treatment of intestinal atresia in newborns.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結新生兒腸閉鎖的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Cisapride on postoperative colonic peristalsis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察西沙比利對結腸術後腸運動功能的影響。

sentences.english: None of the coats was contaminated with VRE.
sentences.chinese: 抗萬古黴素腸球菌的大衣沒有被污染。
薩拉米腸，番茄，黑橄欖，香蒜醬。

sentences.english: Working in the laboratory, the research team took samples of intestinal tissue from mice.
sentences.chinese: 該研究小組在實驗室中對小鼠腸組織取樣。

sentences.english: Chronic intussusception is defined as intussusception lasting for 14 days or more.
sentences.chinese: 慢性腸套疉是指腸套疊持續存在超過14天。

sentences.english: Results The proportion of Enterococci lied in the sixth position in all the isolated clinical pathogens.
sentences.chinese: 結果腸球菌屬的數量佔全部分離到細菌種類的第6位。

sentences.english: Mucosal cells may be the major source of intestinal PAF.
sentences.chinese: 腸粘膜固有細胞是PAF來源的重要細胞。

sentences.english: Salami, chili pepper, onion and oregano.
sentences.chinese: 薩拉米腸，尖椒，洋蔥和香料。

sentences.english: Enterococcus was the natural flora comes from enteron of silkworm.
sentences.chinese: 腸球菌是家蠶消化道中的一種正常菌羣。

sentences.english: Methods 15 patients with acute volvulus were examined by using dynamic radiograph .
sentences.chinese: 方法對15例急性腸扭轉病人應用動態腹平片檢查。

sentences.english: Imipenem was the most effective antibacterial agent for the treatment of Enterobacteriaceae infection.
sentences.chinese: 亞胺培南是治療腸桿菌科細菌感染的有效抗菌劑。

sentences.english: Conclusion Changkangping is an effective drug for diarrhea caused by alteration of intestinal flora.
sentences.chinese: 結論腸康平是治療腸道菌羣失調腹瀉的有效製劑。

sentences.english: Results No postoperative intestinal fistula or no death occurred.
sentences.chinese: 結果本組病例術後未發生腸瘻，無死亡病例。
